listing.listing_description:
Savor the Cape Town sun and sea breeze at the chic, contemporary 15 Ottawa. This Camps Bay vacation rental has bright, airy indoor and outdoor living areas facing the ocean, and is just a short drive from the beach. Its four suite-style bedrooms can host up to ten friends or family members in modern luxury.

You’ll want to spend most of your holiday at the pool area just above the villa, which has incredible sea views and thoughtful amenities. Settle into a lounge chair on the sunny pool terrace or stretch out on one of the sofas in the shade of the pool house while sipping a drink from the kitchenette. As the sun sinks toward the ocean, heat up the barbecue and flip on the sound system or plasma TV for the evening’s entertainment.

With an open-plan great room and sleek modern style, the main villa is just as appealing as the pool house. A vaulted ceiling stretches over a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, a dining area that seats ten in trendy Marais and Louis Ghost chairs, and an inviting sitting area anchored by a sectional and dark, dramatic feature wall. At the front of the great room, a casual lounge area opens to a sunny deck and can be curtained off from the rest of the space for a private beach-cabana feel.

Each of the four bedrooms at 15 Ottawa has an en-suite bathroom for guests’ privacy and comfort. There are two bedrooms with king beds and sea views, including a honeymoon-worthy suite with its own jetted tub, and two bedrooms with queen beds.

The villa’s Clifton location puts guests within easy reach of the beach, mountains and Cape Town city center. It’s less than 10 minutes by car from 15 Ottawa to the white sands of Clifton Beach or Camps Bay Beach, popular with everyone from local families to surfers to the jet set, as well as the iconic Table Mountain, Lion’s Head and the Twelve Apostles that rear above the city. Start your exploration of central Cape Town at the charming V&A Waterfront, about 15 minutes away, which is home to both brand-new shops and restaurants and South Africa’s oldest working harbor.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tour the vineyards of South Africa’s Cape Winelands and return to this superb villa outside Franschhoek Village. Ideal for a family or small group of friends, the home is situated within a 2-villa estate that forms part of Le Quartier Francais, a boutique hotel featuring exceptional restaurants and a wellness spa. Relax by your private pool, cook feasts in your gourmet kitchen, or discover the history and delicacies of the Franschhoek Valley.

The 468-square-meter (5,037-square-foot) villa balances beautiful modern decor with high-end appliances and vintage West Cape accents, evoking both the traditional elegance and contemporary character of Franschhoek. Nestled amid aromatic gardens, the terrace includes a swimming pool lined with lounge chairs and parasols, while the shaded veranda includes an alfresco dining table. The interior features a fully-equipped, chef-grade kitchen and scullery serving a beautiful wooden dining table, as well as a playroom/study and a living room with fireplace.

It’s a short walk from the villa to the fascinating Huguenot Museum and Monument, where you’ll discover the rich history of this French immigrant enclave dating to the 17th century. Le Quartier Francais hotel is also within minutes of your door, featuring an outstanding spa and both casual and fine dining options, while the region surrounding Franschhoek Village abounds with some of the finest restaurants and wineries in South Africa. In addition to being the Gourmet Capital of the West Cape, Franschhoek also features extraordinary natural treasures, notably the Mont Rochelle Nature Reserve.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunshine streams in from floor-to-ceiling windows, water splashes over the infinity pool, and the garden spills down a hillside at this designer villa in Cape Town. But it never feels over the top—just a glamorous mix of marble and wood, mood lighting and sunlight that suits its dramatic ocean-view perch.

When the sun is out, stretch out on a lounger by the infinity pool or settle into the shade of the covered outdoor living area. After sunset, switch on the pool’s mood lighting and fire up the charcoal barbecue. The alfresco dining area at the side of the house feels like it’s tucked into a secret garden, with terraced greenery sloping up on 2 sides.

Slide-away glass walls frame ocean views on one side of the L-shaped great room and garden views on the other. In between, architecture by acclaimed South African firm SAOTA and interiors by designers ARRCC feature an incredible mix of textures and influences, from metal to marble, mid-century to contemporary. Wood panels like a stand of trees separate the living room from the dining area and fully equipped kitchen.

It’s less than 10 minutes to the sand, surf, and chic seafood restaurants along Clifton and Camps Bay beaches, and 10 minutes to shopping and dining in the Cape Town city center. Hike around Lion’s Head or head to the V&A Waterfront for a stroll.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steep yourself in the history and flavors of South Africa’s Cape Winelands at this beautiful modern home in Franschhoek. Nestled within a 2-villa estate that forms part of Le Quartier Francais Hotel, your vacation rental includes a private swimming pool, gourmet kitchen, and generous living and dining areas, as well as access to the hotel’s restaurants and spa. Walk to the fascinating Huguenot Museum and Monument or embark on an unforgettable wine tour of Stellenbosch and the Franschhoek Valley.

The 224-square-meter (2,411-square-foot) villa features high-end appliances, modern furnishings, and beautiful decor that blends vibrant artwork with naturalistic accents. Folding doors open from the family room to the veranda with alfresco dining and terrace with 6-meter (19.7-foot) swimming pool, creating a lovely flow of space and garden-scented air throughout the home. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serves an adjoining dining room for 8. The villa’s 4 bedrooms are perfect for a family or destination wedding guests.

Le Quartier Francais Hotel is located minutes away in Franschhoek Village, and features a swimming pool, fitness center, spa, and both casual and fine dining options. Known as the Gourmet Capital of the West Cape, Frankschoek is brimming with world-class restaurants, wineries, and art galleries, as well as historic architecture dating from the 17th and 18th centuries. The breathtaking natural beauty of the region reaches a crescendo at the nearby Mont Rochelle Nature Reserve.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Terracotta stones complement the turquoise pool at this polished contemporary oasis outside Marrakech. Palm trees line the approach to the estate; lush lawns carpet the space between the main house, an artificial lake, and a separate bungalow; and a butler and housekeeper are there full-time. It’s 15 minutes to both the bustling markets and the calming Majorelle Gardens in the city center.

Traditional materials from Morocco, such as Taza marble and Ourika stone, have been used on the patios and pathways threading the grounds of this vacation rental. In addition to the 25-meter pool, there are plenty of loungers and a barbecue. Inside, the villa has a hammam and massage room for unwinding, and a media room plus Wi-Fi for entertaining friends and family.

Glass-walled rooms filled with mid-century-inspired pieces feel sleek and modern—but not cold, thanks to a wood-burning fireplace in the living room. There’s seating for a dozen upholstered armchairs in the dining room, plus room for one more on a pouf. The fully equipped kitchen also has a breakfast bar and dramatic black cabinetry.

There are 4 bedrooms in the main house at this luxury property, including a master suite with its own lounge area and balcony, and 1 bedroom in a honeymoon-suite-style bungalow with a kitchenette and private entrance. All 5 bedrooms have king beds and ensuite bathrooms.

A holiday at this villa means you’re surrounded by the quiet of La Palmeraie, whose garden-like landscape is dotted with palms and resorts, but not far from the city. It’s a 15-minute drive to central Marrakech, where you can bargain for souvenirs in the souks, wander beneath the ancient city walls in the World Heritage–designated Djemaa el Fna, or draw inspiration from the Majorelle Gardens and the Yves Saint Laurent Museum.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Watch from the pool deck as your neighbor-elephants stroll along the path just outside this breezy villa in the Madikwe Reserve. After a catered breakfast in the alfresco lounge, stretch out on a lounger and work on your tan. When you’re ready, hop in a safari vehicle and set out on a guided tour in search of the big 5 throughout 76k-hectares of a malaria-free natural wonderland.

Barefoot-luxury awaits at this open-air safari villa nestled in an ancient dolomite ridge in South Africa’s Madikwe Reserve. When you’re not out exploring the reserve, enjoy fully catered meals, afternoon swims, and cozy nights by the fireplace in Sovereign House. In the day time, the reserve is yours to discover. Your group will set out on 2 private tours each day with your own guide and safari vehicle to spot Africa’s most beloved creatures. Elephants, lions, leopards, cheetahs, and many more await. You’ll also see more than 300 types of indigenous bird species spread through Madikwe’s grasslands, woodlands, and the Tshwene hills.

Back at Sovereign House, you and your group can recount tales from the safari while enjoying an exquisite dinner crafted by a private chef. After, get a fire going outside and enjoy a few sunset cocktails while you look over pictures from the day. Before bed, rejuvenate with a refreshing alfresco shower or a long soak in the master ensuite’s deep bathtub.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stone, mud, and thatch make for safari-chic surrounds at this villa nestled into the savannah of South Africa’s Madikwe Game Reserve. Each of its 4 bedroom suites has a private deck, plunge pool, and alfresco shower, so you can spot wildlife while having a soak or a spritzer. Your adventure begins with a 45-minute flight from Johannesburg or about a 5-hour drive to the reserve. 

Set off at sunrise on the first of 2 daily game drives included in your stay. Not only will the accredited field guides help you tick off the Big 5, they’ll point out wild dogs and the 60 other mammal species that inhabit the malaria-free reserve. Refreshments are included on the drives, as are chef-prepared meals once you return to the lodge.

Adults can spend days getting close to the landscape on guided bush walks or learning about local fauna in wildlife lectures, while kids can go on their own bush drives and join special children’s activities such as insect investigations, scavenger hunts, and cookie baking. Finish the day with a family marshmallow roast in the boma or a stargazing session with the reserve’s guides.

Round out your stay by booking a treat like an in-villa facial or massage. For a once-in-a-lifetime activity, guests aged over 18 can book the rhino conservation experience, in which you’ll follow—and even assist—a veterinarian from the reserve’s counter-poaching unit as they notch a rhino’s ear and take DNA samples for the national database.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This haven, located in the heart of the Red City, features panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains. Inside, vibrant pops of crimson and gold standout against ivory walls and a smooth champagne-hued floor. Soaring windows allow natural light to stream in from all sides of the living area. Walk along winding alleyways through bustling markets to see snake charmers, singers, and storytellers.

Rich with traditional Moroccan architecture, Villa Yama features intricately carved moldings, decorative wrought iron, and beautifully woven accent rugs. The open-concept space encourages each room to flow seamlessly into the other. Plunge into the teal-tiled swimming pool before sunbathing on the patio loungers in the balmy midday heat. A rooftop lounge features glass railings to give an unobstructed view of the garden below. Lush palm trees surround the backyard for a sense of privacy. An elegant chandelier drips over the dark marble dining table and illuminates each meal. Sit down at the grand piano and let your fingers dance with each note as music fills the expansive estate. 

Marrakech’s city center is a short drive away. Pick up local spices in the maze of souks and add them to your dinner—which can be savoured alfresco. Treat yourself to the luxury of a private chef so you have more time to explore picturesque palaces, stunning gardens, and ancient mosques. After a day of sightseeing, plump wicker furniture under the loggia invites the whole crew to gather around. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A sun-splashed rooftop terrace echoes the iconic shape of Table Mountain at this design-forward apartment in one of Cape Town’s trendiest neighbourhoods. Inside, the villa has a cozy take on the industrial look, with exposed stone walls and warm tones; outside, the city’s scenery and skyline are on full display. Walk to coffee shops, restaurants, and bars in 19th-century buildings in De Waterkant.

Warm days call for a stint on the rooftop terrace, where plenty of seating makes room for family and friends, and the views stretch from the mountains over the city. A second pergola-covered deck is a private spot just off the great room with alfresco dining and a plunge pool; open the glass walls to connect it to the indoor living areas.

Natural tones and organic textures give the open-plan living and dining rooms a low-key stylish vibe, while a soft linen sofa contrasts with the polished concrete coffee table. The adjacent kitchen is fully equipped and has a sleeker feel, thanks to flat-fronted cabinets and a surprise splash of metal tucked underneath the breakfast bar.

The surrounding neighbourhood features charming pockets of 19th-century Cape Dutch and Georgian architecture, along with independent shops, and lively restaurants and bars. It’s a short drive to attractions like the V&A Waterfront and the Table Mountain Cableway, and to the beaches of Camps Bay and Clifton for a day on the sand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Playa del Alicate is a lovely sliver of sand with windswept dunes. An ultra-modern two-story home faces the Mediterranean with a pool and wood deck facing the beach. It calls out to relax in loungers with swimming and waterplay between freshwater and saltwater. Semi-urban, it’s near Marbella, which is still a working city where great restaurants and bars are a given.

The combination of wood, cement, stark white walls, decks, and glass sliders make Frontline Beach Villa a house of equal parts form and function. Technology and efficiency reflect in both the amenities and décor. Solar floor heating, a choice of stairs or elevator are all part of a future that is here in this house. Entertaining is simple and well organized with an open galley kitchen/dining space where sliding doors bring in the Mediterranean sun and breezes.

Bring sand pails to collect shells on leisurely walks along the beach. Discover a centerpiece of driftwood or gather a few kinds of grass to add with lanterns lit on the deck and couch lounging areas. It turns the rhythm of the sea and being together into something special. Food and wine taste just that much better. Conversations seem just that more interesting. And time seems to ebb and flow with the tide. Explore Marbella and all its interesting shops and boutiques. It’s the old narrow streets and historical character that make it so colorful.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exclusive vintage 5-bedroom farmhouse enjoys a peaceful setting on South Africa’s Madikwe Game Reserve. Ideal for family groups or social events, Morukuru Farm House can comfortably accommodate up to 10 guests. A personal chef, butler, babysitting service, ranger and tracker make up your team of private staff who will take care of every detail of your schedule if you wish. Of course you’re free to follow – or abandon – your own plans too. It’s a vacation after all!

Ask your butler to prepare your morning espresso or fix you a freshly-squeezed juice while you indulge in a moment’s contemplation on the poolside terrace. How many of the ‘big five’ will you spot today on your personalized safari? Perhaps this is the day for plugging in your iPod and lounging by the heated infinity pool. Or selecting a book with an intriguing title from the well-stocked library shelves indoors and settling on the breeze-cooled verandah overlooking the garden.

The designers of Morukuru Farm House have mastered indoor/outdoor living. Locally sourced materials and eco furnishings are beautifully offset by subtle lighting and tall glass windows and sliding doors. Spacious air-conditioned open-plan living and dining rooms lead effortlessly onto several patios, inviting you to sit and absorb the peaceful environment. Dining options abound and your personal chef is ready to cook up a storm for you. Take your place at the indoor family dining table which can seat up to 10, gather around the fire in the boma or enjoy a delicious feast by candlelight on the patio.

At the end of a long day spent tracking wild animals, it’s a pleasure to retire to a comfortable bedroom. This modern light-bathed farmhouse has five of them, all bedecked with twin beds, deluxe en-suite bathrooms with freestanding tubs and alfresco showers. Ask your private babysitting service to take care of the kids while you sit back in a well-cushioned chair on your own verandah and savor some time out.

Whether you relish the prospect of seeing lions, elephants and rhino in their natural environment, or just want to bolster your photo collection, there’s plenty to do outside of the game reserve. Ask your staff to arrange an excursion to the local water park, golf course or book a spa treatment (extra costs apply). The nearest airport is 4 hours’ drive and return transfers are included.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This sophisticated, waterside haven, located on the Kruger Park side of the reserve, is surrounded by dense vegetation, rich with wildlife. Vaulted ceilings, exposed stone walls, and African-inspired décor capture the romance of the pioneer era while remaining comfortably modern. Step through retractable glass doors onto your visually mesmerizing patio where the wilderness hums a tranquil harmony.

Hundreds of mammal species and bird varieties are waiting to be discovered. Get up-close with one of the world’s largest creatures with the retreat’s hippo experience. Open-air vehicles take you on savannah drives at sunrise, allowing the animals to be appreciated in their natural habitat. Have your camera ready to capture one of the Big 5: lions, elephants, buffalos, leopards, and rhinos. If you look closely, you might see a cheetah—the fastest land animal—blending into the tall blades of grass. Guided bush walks allow eye-level encounters with insects, plants, birds, and of course, big game. For truly breathtaking views, book a helicopter flight over rivers, gorges, waterfalls, and dramatic rock formations.

Why not pamper yourself between excursions with a trip to the spa? Grab a book from the lodge’s extensive library and curl up fireside. Savour an authentically prepared dinner around the boma fire or at the intimate dining tables for two under an enormous canopy. Field guides share insights into the skies and seasonally shifting constellations. Glowing lanterns illuminate the back terrace after dark, setting the mood for reflecting on your day while sipping one of the region’s flavourful wines. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunset turns silver railings to gold on the terrace of this modern estate in Camps Bay. It’s oriented toward the water, with walls of windows facing the ocean, and focused on your comfort. Drive 5 minutes to Camps Bay’s restaurants and bars, and 7 minutes to its popular beach.

Savour a meal and drink at the alfresco dining area or in a lounger by the private pool and hot tub, all of which look out over the ocean from a broad deck. If you’ve spent the day hiking the Twelve Apostles, which hover just behind the house, stretch out in the exercise area.

Slide open the glass walls to step from the deck into the great room, an urban retreat whose polished stone floors are contrasted by black and chrome accents. There are 2 sitting areas—you can’t miss the magenta sofa in one—a dining area with Lucite Ghost chairs, and a fully equipped kitchen whose breakfast bar is stocked with Kartell stools.

Spend days on the sand of Camps Bay Beach, 7 minutes away, and Clifton Beach, 8 minutes away, mingling with locals and dipping your toes in the water—it can be chilly! Pause for lunch at a seafood restaurant along the shore, spotting para-gliders coming in for a landing, and plan to stay after dark for an evening out in a celeb-favourite bistro or whisky bar. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Light is at the heart of this secluded Santorini villa, with brilliant white walls, courtyard and a blue pearl of a swimming pool. Appreciate the decorative light touches inside, ranging from the myriad bathroom lamps to the underlit luxury beds. Breakfast on the sun terrace and plan a great day exploring the pebble beaches, wineries and and historical villages of this unique Mediterranean island.

Located on the outskirts of one of Santorini’s most charming towns, Eolia Kamari Villa offers both comfort and seclusion. Built on the foundations of a traditional Greek farmhouse, the villa retains those dimensions, providing a cozy but luxury experience. From the gleaming, fully modernized kitchen, prepare a fresh Greek meal to be enjoyed on the wooden dining table that sits in pleasant shade on the terrace. A plunge into the impressive pool is an ever-present option, while the plushly-outfitted living room offers both personality and comfort.

Located to the south-east of the island, Kamari Villa avoids the major crowds that congregate around the more northerly towns of Santorini. The local town of Kamari nevertheless offers fantastic Greek cuisine and bars, with unique options like the historical Cinema Vilatzio. A range of beaches are just a short drive away, while exceptional historical sites like the cliffside Antik necropolis are also conveniently close to the villa, offering a special insight into the ancient past of this dramatic landscape. End the day with a refreshing bottle of local wine, to cap off an ideal day on the island.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
On a secluded seaside property, decorated with lush tropical greenery and palm trees, Roc Manor is ready and waiting to host your next unforgettable Luxury Retreats vacation in sunny South Africa. With four en-suite bedrooms, spacious interiors, and a private outdoor atmosphere, Roc Manor is the perfect host for a family reunion, couples retreat, or high-end corporate affair. Roc Manor’s location is not only scenic, with views of the Apostle Mountains and the Atlantic Ocean, it’s also conveniently positioned just five minutes from Camps Bay Beach.

Roc Manor is decorated with soothing earth tones, warm wood, and plush leather seating, all providing a relaxing vibe that is sure to melt all your stress away. The kitchen features a lengthy bar, perfect for serving up cocktails and promoting a social atmosphere, even when preparing meals. The wide range of ocean-view framing windows is an especially unique point of interest in this villa, with many of them not conforming to traditional form, Roc Manor is truly a vacation destination like no other.

When it’s time to get the party started, Roc Manor is ready with its formal and alfresco dining, breakfast bar, wine fridge, espresso machine, sound system, fireplace, swimming pool, and barbecue. You’ll also appreciate Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and the washer/dryer during your stay. Outside, you’ll love the privacy of the terrace, and scenic vantage points that look out over the Atlantic Ocean.

If you’re a fan of the outdoors, photography, or hiking, then Lion’s Head is a must-see. The hike up Lion’s Head takes around ninety minutes. Once you’ve reached the peak, you’ll be rewarded with some of the most scenic and far stretching views in the country. After you’ve snapped a few pictures, head back down to Cape Town’s bustling city center to enjoy fine dining, designer shopping, and vibrant nightlife. If you’re traveling with kids or the young at heart, Two Ocean’s Aquarium is a great place to spend the afternoon. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, there are several challenging eighteen-hole courses in the area, Metropolitan Golf Club being the closest.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
15 Woodford welcomes guests into easy seaside living in grand style. This classic, comfortable vacation rental makes room for up to twelve guests with well-appointed outdoor areas, open-plan interiors and six bedrooms. Panoramic views bring the sea to you, but if you’d like to get out and explore, the beaches, mountains and central Cape Town are just minutes away.

This luxury family home opens to a private terrace, lawn and pool with views of the mountains behind and the ocean in front. There’s a tempting row of lounge chairs for reading, sunbathing or napping, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining table. After watching the sun set over the water, unwind inside in front of the TV or by browsing via Wi-Fi.

15 Woodford charms from the start with shuttered windows and striped awnings. Step through the sliding glass doors and into the bright, open-plan great room, which has sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. Neutral sofas and a natural-fiber area rug contrast with the sleek Lucite accent tables, while graceful wrought-iron chairs seat twelve around a farmhouse-style dining table. White cabinetry paired with drafting stools creates an on-trend look in the kitchen and breakfast bar.

Five of the villa’s six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and sea views, including four with king beds and one with a queen bed. The sixth bedroom has a queen bed and access to a guest bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms have a mix of rustic and modern pieces, from tufted headboards and weathered wood furniture to Lucite accent chairs.

It would be easy to spend an entire holiday relaxing poolside at 15 Woodford—but it’s just as easy to take off and explore Cape Town. The villa is less than a 5-minute drive from Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach, where you’ll find local families, starry-eyed honeymooners, chic jetsetters and thrill-seeking surfers on the white sands, and less than a 15-minute drive from the city’s most iconic mountains. It’s also less than 15 minutes by car to the V&A Waterfront, which boasts not only upscale boutiques and an array of restaurants, but the distinction of being South Africa’s oldest working harbor.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in views of sea, sky and mountains from your own private estate at Paralia Beachfront Residence. This Crete vacation rental boasts a spectacular location on the shores of Kavros Beach, between the cities of Chania and Rethymnon. Its sprawling layout and five bedrooms make it ideal for a getaway with up to ten friends or a sunny holiday with the extended family.

The villa sits on nearly one acre of land, and its waterfront grounds feature a pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Other amenities include a welcome basket, wine fridge, TV and Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the villa has air conditioning and laundry facilities as well.

The indoor living areas at this luxury property are spread out over three buildings with more than 5,000 square feet of space. Two of the buildings have living areas; the third has a fully equipped kitchen and a dining area. Framed by walls of fold-away glass, the spaces are bright and inviting, with details like warm wood-paneled ceilings and colorful tile.

There are three bedrooms in the residence’s main house and two in a guest house. Two of the main-house bedrooms and both guest-house suites have double beds; the third main-house bedroom has two twin beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

From the expansive grounds to the beach just outside, Paralia Beachfront Residence feels like your own island resort. Spend lazy days lounging by the pool, reliving your honeymoon in the private area on the beach—complete with sunbeds and umbrellas—or reconnecting with the rest of the group. Of course, if you’d like to explore, the beaches in the resort area of Skaleta, the monastery of Arkadi and the fascinating historic sites in the city of Chania are all within day-trip distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Capture city views on every side of this open-concept penthouse in Cape Town, just 5 minutes from the V & A Waterfront. Gather friends at the bar after an incredible dinner and plan out your night over a few cocktails. Throw on the Smart TV and see if there’s a rugby match on. Then, head out to watch the second half at one of the beachfront bars in the Clifton neighbourhood.

 Eclipse’s chic black-and-white color scheme shows off the penthouse’s formal side, while light-toned wood flooring and the rustic dining table remind you of the beautiful environment outside. Exposed brick and steel give the space an industrial edge and accentuate the openness of the main living area. In the kitchen, your inner chef will love the restaurant caliber appliances. The kitchen’s breakfast bar is also a great spot to hang out, especially when dinner is being prepared. And, if you’re in need of some alone time, step out to the balcony at night to watch over the city lights and glowing stars.

 In the morning, start bright and early with a walk along the sands of Clifton’s 1st Beach. After, grab your hiking boots and walk the 90 minute trail to the top of Lion’s Head. At the summit, you’ll be rewarded with the city’s most photo-worthy views. Make your decent, then head to V & A waterfront front for lunch and a little shopping. You could also scout out some nightclub options for later while you’re there.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Mountain and ocean views await at this modern architectural masterpiece in Cape Town’s beautiful Camps Bay neighborhood. When you’re not sipping drinks by the pool, relax and kick back in the media room, or melt your stress away in the sauna. With 2 fully-equipped kitchens, this villa is perfect for multi-family getaways. If you’d rather dine out, hit the V & A Waterfront.

Indoor and outdoor spaces are delightfully undefined at this breezy, ocean-view home. Floor-to-ceiling openings merge spaces to create a vast social atmosphere that is sure to inspire wild nights in. Neutral tones, clean sightlines, and slightly-minimalistic decor give the space an uber-modern vibe. Each bedroom features its own unique accent wall, showing off the villa’s character and thoughtful design. The marble island in the kitchen, which flows seamlessly into the living room, is the perfect place to mix a few drinks before a night on the town. And, if you need to take care of any lingering business, the study provides a secluded space to get a little work done.

Walk down to the shore of Camps Bay Beach, an upmarket coastal community just minutes from home. If you’re feeling adventurous, sign-up for an early morning surfing lesson or try snorkeling later in the afternoon. Just up from the beach, the streets of Camps Bay are lined with trendy bars, restaurants, and boutique shops to explore. And, if you’re up for a hike, Lion’s Head takes about 90-minutes to scale; the view is the best in the city.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched just above Capetown’s most famous beach, Clifton’s 4th, this modern three bedroom is perfect for a small family vacation or getaway with friends. Beach Bungalow is just steps from the sand and surf, yet a private atmosphere is granted thanks to lush tropical greenery and mature palms. With modern-retro vibes, exciting works of art, and an open-air layout, this beach villa will transport you back to simpler times. Beach Bungalow even has a turntable with a great collection of vinyl.

Mixing classic beach house vibes with cutting edge contemporary design, Beach Bungalow is equal parts relaxing and chic. The open concept floorplan allows fresh sea breeze and warm natural sunlight to flow through the interior barrier-free. In the kitchen, your inner chef will surely appreciate the state of the art appliances and functional layout. The formal dining area, kitchen, and main lounge share the largest hosting area in the house, while a smaller television lounge and bar is perfect for movie nights with the family. The master bedroom comes with a queen bed, lavish ensuite, and a private balcony.

Outside, you’ll love gazing upon the ocean view from Beach Bungalow's swimming pool and comfortable terrace lounge area. Back inside, the villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, satellite television, a sound system, and air conditioning.

Even though Beach Bungalow has instant access to Cape Town’s best beach, it’s never a bad idea to explore such a beautiful setting. Luckily, Clifton’s 1st, Boulders, and Muizenberg beaches are all located within a few kilometers. If you’re a fan of photography, the view from atop Lion’s Head is sure to inspire a picture or two. The base is about seven minutes from home, and the hike to the top takes around ninety minutes. And, if you’re traveling with children, Two Oceans Aquarium is always an exciting afternoon excursion.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sun shines overhead, the sea glimmers in the distance and a relaxed holiday awaits at the island retreat of Aelia. This beautifully appointed Crete vacation rental is set in the quieter area of Rethymno, close to a town and several beaches. Its resort-worthy amenities and five bedrooms can welcome up to ten friends or family members in modern Greek style and luxury.

Your stay begins with a welcome basket full of wine and local treats. It only gets sweeter from there, thanks to outdoor living areas with a pool, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue in an al-fresco kitchen, plus a hot tub, sauna and massage room for the grown-ups and a playground for the kids. Inside, the amenities range from an exercise room, pool table and playroom to a media room and Wi-Fi.

Creamy stone floors and charming wrought-iron accents set a refined tone in the open-concept living and dining rooms inside Aelia. A generous sectional and sculptural dining chairs provide seating for eleven, and there’s another breakfast table in a nook adjacent to the fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has three bedrooms with double beds and private en-suite bathrooms. The other two bedrooms have a double bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a hallway bathroom. If you’re traveling with very young children, a baby cot is available upon request. Details like tufted headboards and stone-tile-clad bathrooms lend the bedrooms a look of contemporary elegance.

From Aelia, you can make the 10-minute walk or take the three provided bicycles to the town of Skaleta, where you’ll find a quiet, pebbled beach perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll, as well as a few hotels where you can stop for a drink. If you’ve rented a car, it’s a short drive to Spilies Beach, Aquila Rithymna Beach, and the restaurants and nightlife of the town of Rethymno.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wake up to wall-length ocean-views, just past the master’s 4-post bed, at this modern seaside home in Cape Town. Find the perfect spot to sit and read, work on your tan, or chat with friends across the balcony and fully-open ocean-facing wall. Or, have a drink at the bar while the kids splash around in the pool. Later, head to the V & A Waterfront district for dinner and a little bar hopping.

Gather for exciting evenings in at this open-concept masterpiece home. The L-shaped interior has no barriers to the inside perimeter of the pool deck and balcony, making one spacious area that is perfect for hosting. An eclectic collection of contemporary furniture gives each section of the home a uniquely individual character. Get behind the bar to mix up a few cocktails for friends. Try your hand at traditional South African cuisine in the fully-equipped kitchen. On quieter nights, curl up by the fire or find a good movie on the satellite TV.

Start your morning off with a stroll along Camps Bay or Clifton beach, two of Cape Town’s most beautiful settings. Once you’ve worked up an appetite, check out some of the bakeries, cafes, and brunch spots just off the sand. If you’re in the mood to shop, wander through the Canal Walk Shopping Center or Cape Quarter Lifestyle Village. If you’re feeling ambitious, the best view in the city awaits atop Lion’s Head. The trail leading to its peak takes around 90 minutes hike.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bali Bliss is a gorgeous, four-level home perched above Bali Bay near Cape Town. Wonderfully located just eight minutes on foot from Camps Bay Beach and a short drive to the city center, the villa enjoys sublime views of the Atlantic Ocean and Twelve Apostles Mountains. Exquisite indoor/outdoor living and dining areas and four king bedroom suites accommodating eight provide an enchanting setting for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.

All four levels feature living areas and expansive sea views. The first and top-most level includes the entrance and garage, as well as one of the guestroom suites and a study. Down one level, the main floor features an open-concept living area with gorgeous furnishings, glass walls overlooking the coast and sea, and doors to a balcony with alfresco dining. Sumptuous furnishings, a fireplace, and high-end artwork create an exquisite ambiance of elegance and comfort infused by the ocean's sublime presence. Prepare fabulous meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and kindle the barbeque grill on the balcony; then gather around the alfresco table or in the superb interior dining room with ocean-view table for ten. Kindle the fireplace at night and sip a fine South African wine in the sumptuous living room. Heating, air conditioning, an elevator, and a washer/dryer help ensure total comfort during your stay.

Two more guest suites occupy the third floor, below the living level, including one of the master suites, which opens to a balcony with ocean-view plunge pool and sun loungers. The third-floor bedrooms also share a lounge between them. A second master suite occupies the fourth (ground) floor, and includes a king bed, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub, and direct access to a balcony with a stunning ocean-view. All of the bedrooms are beautifully furnished and include ensuite bathrooms, providing stylish privacy for downtime and rest.

Bali Bliss enjoys one of the finest possible locations on the Western Cape. A short walk to the wonderful town and beach of Camps Bay, you're also an easy drive to world-class Clifton Beach. Lion's Head and Table Mountain are both minutes from your garage, while the heart of Cape Town is an easy seven kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
54 Victoria is an exquisite contemporary villa in the beachside community of Bakoven outside Cape Town. Situated about fifty paces from the waterfront, the eco-friendly home is within walking distance of Camps Bay Beach and enjoys expansive ocean views from its terrace, main living area, and master suite. With four bedrooms accommodating eight guests, 54 Victoria an ideal vacation rental for families, multiple couples, and groups of friends seeking stylish privacy and prime location on the Western Cape.

The villa's lower level features a tiered terrace stretching from the house toward the sea. Sun loungers overlook the fifteen-meter swimming pool, and a hanging pod is poised beside the spa. The deck flows into the downstairs entertainment area, which includes a dining table, lounge, and kitchenette.

Upstairs, a spacious terrace joins an open-concept living and dining area, forming a wonderful setting for meals and relaxation in the ocean breeze. Savor a delicious South African wine in the alfresco lounge, and gather for feasts around the beautiful table for eight. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a wine fridge, while a fireplace, air conditioning, and heating ensure comfort in all seasons. The décor is at once modernist and naturalistic, harmonizing with the precious natural beauty surrounding you while embodying the sophistication of contemporary Cape Town.

All four bedroom suites feature king beds and ensuite bathrooms, and three of the king beds can be converted into pairs of twins to accommodate children or extra guests. The master suite opens to a terrace and features an alfresco shower and deluxe ensuite bathroom with stand-alone double shower and Onsen tub. The master enjoys broad ocean views, and two of the guest suites have partial ocean views.

54 Victoria boasts one of the finest locations within these famed suburbs of Cape Town. You're just a minute by car or an easy walk from Camps Bay Beach, and about a four-minute drive to Clifton Beach. The famed peaks of the Twelve Apostles are just minutes away by car, and you're about thirteen minutes to Cape Town City Center. With the international airport just twenty-six minutes away, the villa is a convenient choice for destination wedding guests and easy weekend escapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning luxury home is situated on the north shore of Crete, in the coastal countryside near Rethymno. Set amid lush gardens and olive groves, the 6,000-square-meter estate enjoys breathtaking sea views from virtually every living area. Ample outdoor spaces include a 100-square-meter infinity swimming pool, lounges and play areas, and multiple alfresco dining tables. Eight deluxe bedroom suites offer exquisite privacy to sixteen travelers, ideal for families, destination wedding guests, and large groups of friends.

The villa offers an expansive venue for festive gatherings and special occasions, along with private spaces for peaceful relaxation. Tiered terraces extend from the main house, featuring lounge areas, a lawn, and a sparkling swimming pool lined with sun chairs and a canopied bed. The primary alfresco table is perched in a pavilion above the pool, accompanied by a charcoal grill, with fabulous sea views and lovely hanging lanterns for nighttime meals. There are two other outdoor tables on the patios flanking the kitchen.

The main interior living area opens to the terraces through floor-to-ceiling glass doors, infusing the home with dreamy breezes and views. Fresh white surfaces glow with sea-reflected light, accentuating the fine wood accents and touches of rich color. The open-concept space features an oval dining table and a comfortable lounge with TV. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and enjoys easy access to all of the dining areas.

There are two bedrooms in the main house: a master suite on the upper level and a king guest suite on the lower level. The other six suites are nestled inside independent bungalows—five attached to the main house, and one in a separate guesthouse located below the pool terrace. All of the bedrooms have superb ensuite bathrooms and access to a balcony or terrace. The guesthouse opens to an expansive terrace with sublime views.

The countryside around Rethymno features enchanting hiking trails, wineries, and beaches, while the medieval city itself is just a short drive away. The larger cities of Heraklion and Chania are also within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
